comment.author: 67908005@N02
comment._content: When adding this photo to the Clerestory Coaches (Railways) group, and as only the picture owner can do this, please kindly geotag, where possible, to identify the location, for the benefit of many of the world wide members! Many thanks. From the look of the countryside, and the livery & era, likely to be in north lancashire /or present day cumbria, possibly near Tebay.
